title: so i got banned for a week, im just curious as to what for.
body: im not denying i didnt deserve a 1 week ban, but was it because of my name or toxicity, iv been informed my name was changed to the "tempname######" so was my name the reason or was i too toxic. just curious lol

replies.body: You dont see anything wrong with 'picktanksautists', or is this a different name?
Autist is the singular form of autistic.

> [{quoted}](name=swordofsun,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2m6ykML,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-02-03T23:56:28.750+0000)
>
> Autist is the singular form of autistic.

Thanks, captain obvious.

I had to assume you didn't know as you didn't seem to understand why the username would be offensive.

Turns out your just a jerk.

> [{quoted}](name=swordofsun,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=A2m6ykML,comment-id=0001000000000000,timestamp=2018-02-05T14:21:45.940+0000)
>
> I had to assume you didn't know as you didn't seem to understand why the username would be offensive.
> 
> Turns out your just a jerk.

I think you are replying to the wrong person..
Contact player support and they'll give you a free name change token and unban you if it's for an inappropriate name.
What would a ban do against a summoner name? Wouldnt they just force a name change?
Could you post the log you get when you try to log in?
well when i login it just says youve been banned and link me to the terms of use lol
Did you get a chat log in-game? If so, it's likely for that. If not, it could be the name.
yeah no chat logs, im assuming its for the name
You don't get banned for having an inappropriate name.
apparently twice in a row does :p
